NOTE TO AUTHOR: Highlighted, italicized text throughout this template is provided solely as background information to assist you in creating this document. Please delete all such text, as well as the instructions in each section, prior to submitting this document. ONLY YOUR PROJECT-SPECIFIC INFORMATION SHOULD APPEAR IN THE FINAL VERSION OF THIS DOCUMENT.

INFO: The Software Validation and Verification Plan document outlines the planned tasks and expectations for verification of Software Requirements.

  • WHO will be responsible for completion, review, and approval of these tasks.
  • HOW the verification will be performed including failure resolution.
  • WHAT documentation/deliverables will be generated.

INFO: The following sections contain Task items that define what is necessary to prepare for and perform testing.

Prepare and approve the test plan

Describe the scope, approach, resources, and schedule of the testing activities and identification of the items being tested, the features to be tested, the testing tasks to be performed, the personnel responsible for each task, and the risks associated with this plan.

Prepare and approve Software Test Case Specification

Define the test cases to test the software.
